## For Developers

BlitzClaw is built on [OpenClaw](https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw), an open-source AI agent framework.

### Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 + TypeScript
- PostgreSQL (Neon) + Prisma
- Clerk (Auth) + Polar.sh (Billing)
- Multi-cloud: Hetzner, DigitalOcean, Vultr (all Frankfurt)

### Self-Hosting

Want to run your own? The core is open source:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw
```

BlitzClaw handles the infrastructure so you don't have to.
